rows.label: tlk000010_msg0002
rows.name:
We have received word from
Special Inquisitor Meleph.

rows.label: tlk000010_msg0003
rows.name:
I understand you have found a
lead on the artificial Blade?

rows.label: tlk000010_msg0004
rows.name:
I shall connect you to the Special Inquisitor.
Please wait a moment.
